seo.title: Wybrzeże Amalfitańskie bez auta: przewodniki po trasach
seo.description: Przegląd tras bez samochodu: jak łączyć promy, autobusy i spacery, by zobaczyć jak najwięcej.

linkLabel: Wybrzeże Amalfitańskie bez auta: przewodniki po trasach
intro: Build a no-car Amalfi Coast itinerary by chaining ferries and buses in a logical loop, leaving time for slow mornings and weather pivots.

sections.title: 5–6 day slow roll
body: Plan a beach-hop day between Arienzo, Laurito, and Marina di Praia using coastal ferries or water taxis.

sections.title: 7-day loop
body: Leave the final day flexible for repeats or a rest day before onward travel.

tips: Group activities by geography so you only climb big stair sets once per day.

faqs.q: Can I swap ferries for buses in bad weather?
a: Yes—buses run year-round. Start early, buy tickets in advance, and expect journeys to take 20–30 minutes longer.
